data.name: Barbados Style Hot Sauce
data.desc:
Mark’s Barbados Style Hot Sauce is a traditional Bajan style ‘pepper sauce’ featuring mango, papaya, pineapple and fiery Scotch Bonnet peppers. This sauce is both sweet and spicy and kept chunky offering a different flavour with each bite. A delicious tropical companion to any dish.

Ingredients: Spring water, mango, onion, scotch bonnet peppers, papaya, pineapple, carrot, vinegar, prepared mustard, sea salt, spices, rum, garlic.

All of my sauces are 100% natural and preservative-free. Hand-made in Montreal, Canada.

data.name: Fermented Jalapeño
data.desc:
Mark’s Fermented Jalapeño hot sauce features bright and fresh-tasting green jalapeño and habanero chilies. Like Mark’s Red Chili sauce this sauce is fermented with white wine creating a unique flavour. Seeds are left in to provide extra heat and texture.

Ingredients: Jalapeño and habanero peppers, onion, white vinegar, apple cider vinegar*, sea salt, white wine, garlic, raw cane sugar. *Organic

All of my sauces are 100% natural and preservative-free. Hand-made in Montreal, Canada.

data.name: Fermented Red Chili
data.desc:
Mark’s Fermented Red Chili hot sauce features a unique blend of fermented red chilies. This sauce is fermented with white wine creating a unique and complex taste. Designed to be packed full of flavour, but not too hot to enjoy with all your favourite dishes.

Ingredients: Red chilis, onion, white vinegar, apple cider vinegar*, sea salt, white wine, garlic, raw cane sugar*. *Organic

All of my sauces are 100% natural and preservative-free. Hand-made in Montreal, Canada.
